floatingBar.description: Make simple-bar floating by adding padding around it

noBarBg.description: Remove the background of the bar

noColorInData.description: Remove colors from all data widgets

bottomBar.description: Place simple-bar at the bottom of the screen

sideDecoration.description: Add an Apple logo on the left side of simple-bar

disableAnimations.description: Disable all persistent animations in simple-bar

widgetMaxWidth.description: Max width for widgets. Overflowing text while be shown with a sliding effect

spacesBackgroundColorAsForeground.description: Use spaces background color as foreground color

widgetsBackgroundColorAsForeground.description: Use widgets background color as foreground color

font.description: Define the font used by simple-bar

fontSize.description: Define the font size for all the widgets. You can use any css unit. It can particulary be usefull if you have displays with different pixel density and different scaling factor in which case you can set a value with a relative viewport unit like 1vh. Be careful to not set a value too high as it could break all simple-bar interface as this setting is used for every texts

yabaiPath.description: Determine the path to the yabai binary

aerospacePath.description: Determine the path to the aerospace binary

flashspacePath.description: Determine the path to the flashspace binary

windowManager.description: Determine the window manager used by simple-bar to display spaces & processes: yabai or aerospace

shell.description: Depending on your preference you can choose between these 3 shell for all simple-bar scripts execution: sh, bash, dash

terminal.description: Define the terminal used by simple-bar to run commands

slidingAnimationPace.description: Determine the speed of the sliding animation for widgets with overflowing text. Default is "4". The higher slidingAnimationPace value, the faster the texts slides (must be > 0)

enableServer.description: Enable websocket connection to the server in each data widget. You must install and launch simple-bar-server before activating this setting

serverSocketPort.description: Determine the port on which the websockets will be opened. Check you simple-bar-server config file to get the right port if you changed it

yabaiServerRefresh.description: Enable websocket connection to the server in yabai spaces & process widgets. You must install and launch simple-bar-server before activating this setting

aerospaceServerRefresh.description: Enable websocket connection to the server in AeroSpace spaces widgets. You must install and launch simple-bar-server before activating this setting

flashspaceServerRefresh.description: Enable websocket connection to the server in FlashSpace spaces widgets. You must install and launch simple-bar-server before activating this setting

colorMain.description: Override the main color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorMainAlt.description: Override the main alternative color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorMinor.description: Override the minor color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorAccent.description: Override the accent color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorRed.description: Override the red color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorGreen.description: Override the green color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorYellow.description: Override the yellow color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorOrange.description: Override the orange color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorBlue.description: Override the blue color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorMagenta.description: Override the magenta color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorCyan.description: Override the cya color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorBlack.description: Override the black color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorWhite.description: Override the white color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorForeground.description: Override the foreground color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

colorBackground.description: Override the background color of the theme. Must be a valid CSS color.

showOnDisplay.description: The displays on which the process will be displayed. Add a list of indexes (for example: "1,2"). Leave blank to display the widget on every spaces

displayOnlyCurrent.description: Insead of showing all processes of the current space, simple-bar will only show the current one

centered.description: The process widget will be centered. Do not activate it if you run simple-bar on a mac with a notch

showCurrentSpaceMode.description: [yabai] Show the current space yabai mode on the left of the processes

displaySkhdMode.description: [yabai] If the current space is in stack mode, each process will have its stack index displayed

displayStackIndex.description: [yabai] Show stack index only on focused process

displayOnlyCurrentStack.description: [yabai] Show stack-index only for focused process

showOnDisplay.description: The displays on which the process will be displayed. Add a list of indexes (for example: "1,2"). Leave blank to display the widget on every spaces

exclusions.description: You can exclude some process with their app name. Simply add the wanted app name and separate multiple app names with a comma

titleExclusions.description: Same as previous settings but with the window title name

spacesExclusions.description: Whole space(s) can be excluded for the spaces display by their name here separated by a comma

exclusionsAsRegex.description: Instead of using comma in the exclusions fields, you can use the regex syntax

displayAllSpacesOnAllScreens.description: By default, only spaces attached to the current display are displayed on all displays. This can be changed with this setting

hideDuplicateAppsInSpaces.description: Each instance of an app is displayed separately in their respective space. You can merge all duplicates with this setting

displayStickyWindowsSeparately.description: [yabai] Sticky windows are displayed on each screens by default. You can choose to displayed only in one place thanks to this settings (at the left of all the spaces)

hideCreateSpaceButton.description: [yabai] Simply hide the "+" button (which is only visible if you have SIP disabled)

hideEmptySpaces.description: Hide spaces with no opened apps

showOptionsOnHover.description: Space options are opened on right click if this setting is set to false

switchSpacesWithoutYabai.description: Instead of relying on yabai to switch to a specific space (on space click), simple-bar will trigger the "switch to prev/next" space shortcut which need to be enabled in macos settings to be working

showOnlyFlashspaceSpaceIndex.description: [FlashSpace] Show only the space index for each space

hideFlashspaceAppIcons.description: [FlashSpace] Hide the app icons in the spaces display

customAeroSpaceDisplayIndexes.description: [AeroSpace] Allow display numbering override in case of monitor numbering mismatch between AeroSpace and Übersicht

^\\d+$.description: Override the display index for the monitor with the given ID
